text: Scouts of Albion
The Ravenqueen Host is naturally supported by the Raven-Queen's own Household on Albion, who will help supply reinforcements.
Albion Raiders (20)
The Ravenqueen Host is supported by the Petty Cheiftains of Albion, who will do what they can to supply reinforcements.
Albion Guardians (40)
The Ravenqueen Host has the support of the Overkings of Albion, who will ensure you receive veteran warriors from the homeland.
Vanquishers of Chaos (60)
The Ravenqueen Host has the full backing of the Council of Truthsayers. The most elite warriors of the Albion clans will be sent to support you.
Scourge of Chaos (80)
The Ravenqueen Host's exploits are spoken of in every hut and across every campfire's in Albion - its warriors will be known as legendary folk-heroes!
Champions of Order (100)
The Ravenqueen Host has proven beyond doubt to be Albion's most elite force, carrying out Mhorrinion's will with unrelenting fortitude to vanquish Chaos – and it will continue to do so!
Ignored
The Chaos gods have very little interest in the Ravenqueen's exploits.
Level 1 – Unworthy (10)
The eyes of Chaos give you but a fleeting glance.
Level 2 – Plaything (20)
The eyes of Chaos are starting to take notice of you.
Level 3 – Challenger (30)
Lowly Warlord's and Marauder Chieftain's seek you out to gain petty boons from the Dark Gods.
Level 4 – Worthy (40)
Lords of Chaos seeking glory and daemonhood come to hunt and flay you.
Level 5 – Marked! (50)
The eyes of chaos gaze upon you, they see a worthy challenge and set forth the Champions of Chaos!
